mapper.select: select a.VIP_ID as VIP_ID ,b.VIP_Level_ID as VIP_Level_ID ,VIP_Name,Level_Description,Remains from VIP_InFormation a,VIP_Discount b,VIP_Level c where c.VIP_ID=a.VIP_ID and c.VIP_Level_ID=b.VIP_Level_ID and c.vip_ID=#{vip_ID}
mapper.delete: delete from VIP_Level where Remains=0 or CURDATE() >= DATE_ADD(Recharge_Time, INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
